page.title: 20THE DOMESDAY PROJECT 1985
page.content: The Domesday Project for the area around the villages of{Crawley Down and{Turners Hill,}in{Sussex,}was undertaken by the children and teachers of{Classes 3Q and 3X}at {Crawley Down Church of England {(Controlled) Junior School}and of {Class 2}at{Turners Hill Church of {England (Controlled) Primary School, during the months of{June}and{July}in {1985. The project involved the compiling of a{questionnaire,}to discover local ways of life, which was distributed to 20% of the houses in the area. The{ {Names Survey}was conducted among{350 {children. Farms}and{houses}were also {visited}and{people interviewed,}for which many thanks are owed. The project brought together the children of two schools to learn about the area they live in.
